name: KUMARASWAMY S
career_objective: Motivated Software Tester with a solid foundation in Java, SQL, and JavaScript, coupled with experience in web development. projects.name: JOURNEY: Blogging Web App
features: Implemented a modern blog editor using Editor JS for an enhanced user experience.

Ensured mobile responsiveness and modern design.
Enhanced the user experience with dynamic blog pages, making the content easily searchable and accessible.
Implemented state management using React Context API for efficient data handling across components.
Utilized Vite for fast development and efficient build processes in the front-end.
